data.title: Safavid Iran - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: The Safavid Empire was a Persian empire that existed from 1501 to 1736. It was known for its Shi'a Muslim identity, centralized government, and trade relations.
data.text:
Definition

The Safavid Empire was a Persian empire that existed from 1501 to 1736. It was known for its Shi'a Muslim identity, centralized government, and trade relations.
